properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 6 at 10:47AM MST until February 7 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to 18
inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph.

* WHERE...Central Yampa River Basin.

* WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. A
detailed map of the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST FRIDAY
